election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1808 U.S. House of Representatives, District 2

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: Der Freymuthige Libanoner (Lebanon, PA) reports 2831 votes for Robert Brown, 2147 votes for John Ross, 2152 votes for William Milnor, 2830 votes for John Pugh, 2826 votes for John Hahn, and 2146 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Commonwealth (Pittsburgh, PA) reports 2831 votes for Robert Brown, 2147 votes for John Ross, 2152 votes for William Milnor, 2830 votes for John Pugh, 2826 votes for John Hahn, and 2146 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2831 votes for Robert Brown, 2147 votes for John Ross, 2152 votes for William Milnor, 2830 votes for John Pugh, 2826 votes for John Hahn, and 2146 votes for Rosewell Welles in Montgomery County.

The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2320 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2208 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Pennsylvania Correspondent, and Farmers' Advertiser (Doylestown, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2320 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2308 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Freeman's Journal, and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2320 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2308 votes for Rosewell Welles.

Poulson's American Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2320 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2308 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Pennsylvania Herald, and Easton Intelligencer (Easton, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2320 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2208 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2848 votes for Robert Brown, 2312 votes for John Ross, 2330 votes for William Milnor, 2826 votes for John Pugh, 2827 votes for John Hahn, and 2308 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2818 votes for Robert Brown, 2147 votes for John Ross, 2152 votes for William Milnor, 2820 votes for John Pugh, 2826 votes for John Hahn, and 2146 votes for Rosewell Welles.

sub_unit.name: Abington
sub_unit.note: The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 294 votes for Robert Brown, 167 votes for John Ross, 167 votes for William Milnor, 294 votes for John Pugh, 294 votes for John Hahn, and 167 votes for Rosewell Welles.

The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 291 votes for Robert Brown, 327 votes for John Ross, 326 votes for William Milnor, 291 votes for John Pugh, 291 votes for John Hahn, and 328 votes for Rosewell Welles.

sub_unit.name: Kreps
sub_unit.note: The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 340 votes for John Hahn.
The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 340 votes for John Hahn.

sub_unit.name: Norristown
sub_unit.note: The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 539 votes for Robert Brown, 491 votes for John Ross, 493 votes for William Milnor, 538 votes for John Pugh, 534 votes for John Hahn, and 490 votes for Rosewell Welles.

sub_unit.name: Sumneytown
sub_unit.note: The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 316 votes for Robert Brown, 104 votes for John Ross, and 103 votes for William Milnor.
The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 316 votes for Robert Brown.

sub_unit.name: Trappe
sub_unit.note: The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 248 votes for Rosewell Welles.
The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 366 votes for Robert Brown and 248 votes for Rosewell Welles.

sub_unit.name: Webers
sub_unit.note: The Democratic Press (Philadelphia, PA) reports 462 votes for John Ross.

The Norristown Herald and Weekly Advertiser (Norristown, PA) reports 245 votes for Robert Brown, 463 votes for John Ross, 464 votes for William Milnor, 246 votes for John Pugh, 243 votes for John Hahn, and 463 votes for Rosewell Welles.

sub_unit.name: Northampton
sub_unit.note: The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2846 votes for Robert Brown and 2526 votes for William Milnor.
The Freeman's Journal, and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2620 votes for William Milnor.

sub_unit.name: Easton
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Herald, and Easton Intelligencer (Easton, PA) reports 590 votes for Robert Brown, 491 votes for John Ross, 490 votes for William Milnor, 582 votes for John Pugh, 580 votes for John Hahn, and 482 votes for Rosewell Welles.
